  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.jemmy.Outputable, org.netbeans.jemmy.Timeoutable

    public class TreeTableOperator
extends org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.JTableOperator
    Handle IDE's org.openide.explorer.view.TreeTable component which is used instead of JTree in Options dialog, ...

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TreeTableOperator.RenderedMouseDriver
